[Exp Rate x16]
04000000 003FD3EC 0B011129
MOVE.L $0B011129, #$0003FD3EC(R0)

[Exp Rate x4]
04000000 003FD3EC 0B010929
MOVE.L $0B010929, #$0003FD3EC(R0)

[Exp Rate x8]
04000000 003FD3EC 0B010D29
MOVE.L $0B010D29, #$0003FD3EC(R0)

[Get Pre-Order Weapons]
04000000 002BF0F0 52800020
MOVE.L $52800020, #$0002BF0F0(R0)

[Healing Incense Max]
58010000 04601100
58011000 000000B8
58011000 00000000
58011000 000000F8
58011000 00000118
78010000 00000010
68010000 00000063 00000063
MOVE.Q #$0004601100, R1
MOVE.Q #$00000000B8(R1), R1
MOVE.Q #$0000000000(R1), R1
MOVE.Q #$00000000F8(R1), R1
MOVE.Q #$0000000118(R1), R1
ADD.Q $00000010, R1
MOVE.Q $0000006300000063, (R1)

[MoveSpeed x1.5]
58010000 04601100
58011000 000000B8
58011000 00000000
58011000 000000F8
78010000 000001C4
68010000 41600000 41180000
MOVE.Q #$0004601100, R1
MOVE.Q #$00000000B8(R1), R1
MOVE.Q #$0000000000(R1), R1
MOVE.Q #$00000000F8(R1), R1
ADD.Q $000001C4, R1
MOVE.Q $4160000041180000, (R1)

[MoveSpeed x2]
58010000 04601100
58011000 000000B8
58011000 00000000
58011000 000000F8
78010000 000001C4
68010000 41600000 41600000
MOVE.Q #$0004601100, R1
MOVE.Q #$00000000B8(R1), R1
MOVE.Q #$0000000000(R1), R1
MOVE.Q #$00000000F8(R1), R1
ADD.Q $000001C4, R1
MOVE.Q $4160000041600000, (R1)

[No Skill Cooldown]
04000000 0020065C 1E2703E0
04000000 002008DC 1E2703E0
MOVE.L $1E2703E0, #$00020065C(R0)
MOVE.L $1E2703E0, #$0002008DC(R0)

[Press L to Max Affinity]
80000040
58010000 04601100
58011000 000000B8
58011000 00000000
58011000 000000F8
58011000 00000110
78010000 00000030
64010000 00000000 43960000
20000000
IF L
MOVE.Q #$0004601100, R1
MOVE.Q #$00000000B8(R1), R1
MOVE.Q #$0000000000(R1), R1
MOVE.Q #$00000000F8(R1), R1
MOVE.Q #$0000000110(R1), R1
ADD.Q $00000030, R1
MOVE.L $0000000043960000, (R1)
END

[Soulstones Always Drop (after 1 normal drop)]
04000000 00350728 D503201F
MOVE.L $D503201F, #$000350728(R0)

[Soulstones Rate x4]
04000000 003506DC 11001001
MOVE.L $11001001, #$0003506DC(R0)

[Soulstones Rate x5]
04000000 003506DC 11001401
MOVE.L $11001401, #$0003506DC(R0)

[Soulstones Rate x6]
04000000 003506DC 11001801
MOVE.L $11001801, #$0003506DC(R0)

[Unlimited HP]
04000000 00202340 D65F03C0
MOVE.L $D65F03C0, #$000202340(R0)
